text: Napoleon Sarony (March 9, 1821 â€“ November 9, 1896) was an American lithographer and photographer. He was a very popular portrait photographer, best known for his photos of the actors of late-19th-century American theater. His son, Otto Sarony, continued the family business as a theater and movie star photographer. ==References== Category:1821 births Category:1896 deaths Category:American photographers Category:People from Quebec City
title: Napoleon Sarony
